commit.message: Add field for text edits to `InlayHint`

verification.payload:
tree 13d71d3360a8b701c9b9a70729de858360d793ef
parent ac03de773f750f7b327720778e14d141f5e78d63
author Ryo Yoshida <low.ryoshida@gmail.com> 1680774814 +0900
committer Ryo Yoshida <low.ryoshida@gmail.com> 1681293835 +0900

Add field for text edits to `InlayHint`

files.patch:
@@ -112,6 +112,7 @@ pub(super) fn hints(
         range: closing_token.text_range(),
         kind: InlayKind::ClosingBrace,
         label: InlayHintLabel::simple(label, None, linked_location),
+        text_edit: None,
     });
 
     None

@@ -510,7 +510,7 @@ pub(crate) fn inlay_hint(
             | InlayKind::AdjustmentPostfix
             | InlayKind::ClosingBrace => None,
         },
-        text_edits: None,
+        text_edits: inlay_hint.text_edit.map(|it| text_edit_vec(line_index, it)),
         data: None,
         tooltip,
         label,
